tags.name: mgt-person
tags.description: The person component is used to display a person or contact by using their photo, name, and/or email address.
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * The person component is used to display a person or contact by using their photo, name, and/or email address.
 *
 * @export
 * @class MgtPerson
 * @extends {MgtTemplatedComponent}
 */

attributes.name: person-query
attributes.description: allows developer to define name of person for component

attributes.name: user-id
attributes.description: user-id property allows developer to use id value to determine person

attributes.name: show-name
attributes.description: determines if person component renders user-name

attributes.name: show-email
attributes.description: determines if person component renders email

attributes.name: person-details
attributes.description: object containing Graph details on person

attributes.name: person-image
attributes.description:
Set the image of the person
Set to '@' to look up image from the graph
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
   * Set the image of the person
   * Set to '@' to look up image from the graph
   *
   * @type {string}
   * @memberof MgtPersonCard
   */

attributes.name: person-card
attributes.description:
Sets how the person-card is invoked
Set to PersonCardInteraction.none to not show the card
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
   * Sets how the person-card is invoked
   * Set to PersonCardInteraction.none to not show the card
   *
   * @type {PersonCardInteraction}
   * @memberof MgtPerson
   */

properties.name: templateConverters
properties.description: Collection of functions to be used in template binding

properties.name: personQuery
properties.description: allows developer to define name of person for component

properties.name: userId
properties.description: user-id property allows developer to use id value to determine person

properties.name: showName
properties.description: determines if person component renders user-name

properties.name: showEmail
properties.description: determines if person component renders email

properties.name: personDetails
properties.description: object containing Graph details on person

properties.name: personImage
properties.description:
Set the image of the person
Set to '@' to look up image from the graph
properties.jsDoc:
/**
   * Set the image of the person
   * Set to '@' to look up image from the graph
   *
   * @type {string}
   * @memberof MgtPersonCard
   */

properties.name: personCardInteraction
properties.description:
Sets how the person-card is invoked
Set to PersonCardInteraction.none to not show the card
properties.jsDoc:
/**
   * Sets how the person-card is invoked
   * Set to PersonCardInteraction.none to not show the card
   *
   * @type {PersonCardInteraction}
   * @memberof MgtPerson
   */

cssProperties.name: --avatar-size
cssProperties.description: Avatar size when both name and email are shown

cssProperties.name: --avatar-font-size
cssProperties.description: Avatar font-size when both name and email are shown

tags.name: mgt-agenda
tags.description: Web Component which represents events in a user or group calendar.
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * Web Component which represents events in a user or group calendar.
 *
 * @export
 * @class MgtAgenda
 * @extends {MgtTemplatedComponent}
 */

attributes.name: events
attributes.description: array containg events from user agenda.

attributes.name: group-by-day
attributes.description: allows developer to define agenda to group events by day.

attributes.name: date
attributes.description: stores current date for intial calender selection in events.

attributes.name: days
attributes.description: sets number of days until endate, 3 is the default

attributes.name: event-query
attributes.description: allows developer to specify a different graph query that retrieves events

attributes.name: show-max
attributes.description: allows developer to define max number of events shown

attributes.name: group-id
attributes.description: determines if agenda events come from specific group

properties.name: templateConverters
properties.description: Collection of functions to be used in template binding

properties.name: events
properties.description: array containg events from user agenda.

properties.name: groupByDay
properties.description: allows developer to define agenda to group events by day.

properties.name: date
properties.description: stores current date for intial calender selection in events.

properties.name: days
properties.description: sets number of days until endate, 3 is the default

properties.name: eventQuery
properties.description: allows developer to specify a different graph query that retrieves events

properties.name: showMax
properties.description: allows developer to define max number of events shown

properties.name: groupId
properties.description: determines if agenda events come from specific group

cssProperties.name: --event-box-shadow
cssProperties.description: Event box shadow color and size

tags.name: mgt-get
tags.description: Custom element for making Microsoft Graph get queries
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * Custom element for making Microsoft Graph get queries
 *
 * @export
 * @class mgt-get
 * @extends {MgtTemplatedComponent}
 */

attributes.name: resource
attributes.description: The resource to get

attributes.name: scopes
attributes.description: The resource to get

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: Api version to use for request

attributes.name: max-pages
attributes.description:
Maximum number of pages to get for the resource
default = 3
if <= 0, all pages will be fetched
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
   * Maximum number of pages to get for the resource
   * default = 3
   * if <= 0, all pages will be fetched
   *
   * @type {boolean}
   * @memberof MgtGet
   */

properties.name: templateConverters
properties.description: Collection of functions to be used in template binding

properties.name: resource
properties.description: The resource to get

properties.name: scopes
properties.description: The resource to get

properties.name: version
properties.description: Api version to use for request

properties.name: maxPages
properties.description:
Maximum number of pages to get for the resource
default = 3
if <= 0, all pages will be fetched
properties.jsDoc:
/**
   * Maximum number of pages to get for the resource
   * default = 3
   * if <= 0, all pages will be fetched
   *
   * @type {boolean}
   * @memberof MgtGet
   */

properties.name: response
properties.description: Gets or sets the response of the request

properties.name: error
properties.description: Gets or sets the error (if any) of the request

tags.name: mgt-people-picker
tags.description: Web component used to search for people from the Microsoft Graph
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * Web component used to search for people from the Microsoft Graph

 */

attributes.description: containing object of MgtPersonDetails.

attributes.name: show-max
attributes.description: determining how many people to show in list.

attributes.name: group-id
attributes.description: value determining if search is filtered to a group.

attributes.name: selected-people
attributes.description: array of user picked people.

properties.description: Collection of functions to be used in template binding

properties.name: people
properties.description: containing object of MgtPersonDetails.

properties.name: showMax
properties.description: determining how many people to show in list.

properties.name: groupId
properties.description: value determining if search is filtered to a group.

properties.name: selectedPeople
properties.description: array of user picked people.

Microsoft Graph

attributes.description: Set the person details to render
attributes.jsDoc:

   *
   * @type {(MicrosoftGraph.User
   *     | MicrosoftGraph.Person
   *     | MicrosoftGraph.Contact)}
   * @memberof MgtPersonCard

attributes.description:
Set the image of the person
Set to '@' to look up image from the graph
attributes.jsDoc:

   * Set the image of the person
   * Set to '@' to look up image from the graph
   *
   * @type {string}
   * @memberof MgtPersonCard
   */

attributes.description: Gets or sets whether additional details section is rendered

Gets or sets whether additional details should be inherited from an mgt-person parent
Useful when used as template in an mgt-person component

Set to '@' to look up image from the graph

tags.name: mgt-tasks
tags.description: component enables the user to view, add, remove, complete, or edit tasks. It works with tasks in Microsoft Planner or Microsoft To-Do.
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * component enables the user to view, add, remove, complete, or edit tasks. It works with tasks in Microsoft Planner or Microsoft To-Do.
 *
 * @export
 * @class MgtTasks
 * @extends {MgtBaseComponent}
 */

attributes.name: read-only
attributes.description: determines if tasks are un-editable

attributes.name: data-source
attributes.description: determines which task source is loaded, either planner or todo

attributes.name: target-id
attributes.description: if set, the component will only show tasks from either this plan or group

attributes.name: target-bucket-id
attributes.description: if set, the component will only show tasks from this bucket or folder

attributes.name: initial-id
attributes.description: if set, the component will first show tasks from this plan or group

attributes.name: initial-bucket-id
attributes.description: if set, the component will first show tasks from this bucket or folder

attributes.name: hide-header
attributes.description: sets whether the header is rendered

attributes.name: group-id
attributes.description: allows developer to define specific group id

properties.name: templateConverters
properties.description: Collection of functions to be used in template binding

properties.name: isNewTaskVisible
properties.description: Set whether new task is visible
properties.jsDoc:
/**
   * Set whether new task is visible
   *
   * @memberof MgtTasks
   */

properties.name: readOnly
properties.description: determines if tasks are un-editable

properties.name: dataSource
properties.description: determines which task source is loaded, either planner or todo

properties.name: targetId
properties.description: if set, the component will only show tasks from either this plan or group

properties.name: targetBucketId
properties.description: if set, the component will only show tasks from this bucket or folder

properties.name: initialId
properties.description: if set, the component will first show tasks from this plan or group

properties.name: initialBucketId
properties.description: if set, the component will first show tasks from this bucket or folder

properties.name: hideHeader
properties.description: sets whether the header is rendered

properties.name: groupId
properties.description: allows developer to define specific group id

cssProperties.name: --task-new-add-button-disabled-background
cssProperties.description: Task new add button disabled background

tags.name: mgt-msal-provider

attributes.name: depends-on
attributes.description:
Higher priority provider that should be initialized before attempting
to initialize this provider. This provider will only be initialized
if all higher priority providers are not available.
